Description:
Improvement Notice served,

You have failed to conduct a suitable and sufficient assessment of the risks to your employees, which arise from the production and use of a dangerous substances (namely Biogas containing Methane) which is or is liable to be present at your sites, during the operation of the anaerobic digestion plant, gas storage and operation of the electricity generation equipment.

Improvement Notice served,

You have failed to prepare a suitable and sufficient assessment of the risks created by your work activity, to the health of your employees (namely exposure to biogas, microorganisms (such as Salmonella), and contaminants in dog food feedstock), and the steps that need to be taken to meet the requirements of the above mentioned Regulations.
